resources.string:
App starts scanning devices automatically.
 Devices will be listed as they are discovered.
 Choose a device to connect to.
 App will start receiving lamp data.

 To open the lamp control panel, click on a lamp (green) or a group (red).
 To view lamp data, press the info button on top right corner of the panel.

 To expand/collapse a group, press and hold on a group.
 To start selecting lamps, press and hold on a lamp.
 Click on "Create new group" to create new group from selected lamps.
 Click on "Remove" to remove selected lamps from group.
 Note: Lamps from group "All" cannot be removed.
